{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = AC3200 Tri-Band Smart Wi-Fi Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA9200/ |sp = http://support.linksys.com/us/support-product?pid=01t80000003efNkAAI |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Linksys |model = EA9200 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (4A) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC32003R |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Q87-EA9200 |icid = 3839A-EA9200 |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4709A0;BCM4709A0KFEBG, TT1417 P10, 372828-08 Z1D; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARMv7 |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML01G100TFI00; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B2G1646Q-BCK0; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = CFE;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = looks like it |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = 256QAM |addchip = 3-lane, 3-port PCIe Gen2 Switch;PLX Technology;PEX8603;PLX, Technology (R), PEX8603-AB50NI G, 1402, 1475B, TAIWAN;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = WG9117B |manuf_rev = AC33 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/03/2014 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00ON7AX3U |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG, TN1415 P11, 374072-04 3A W; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1300 |nqam1 = 600 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG, TN1415 P11, 374072-04 3A W; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |nqam2 = 600 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|rad3chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG, TN1415 P11, 374072-04 3A W; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad3txchains = 3 |rad3rxchains = 3 |rad3sstreams = 3 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam3 = 600 |rad3n = 450 |rad3g = 54 |rad3b = 11 |rad3freq = 2.4 |rad3correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad3cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P/N: 141911720033J R01" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :OEM: ''[[Arcadyan]]'' WG9117BAC33
{{WiFiCert|WFA56630|10/15/2014}}
==Specifications== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4709A0 @1 GHz DualCore SoC (ARM Cortex A9) *WLAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM43602 - 3T3R 2.4/5 GHz 802.11abgn/ac (256-QAM) :integrated CPU @320MHz (ARM Cortex R4) w/ embedded 960KB SRAM :[https://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s817141 ''Broadcom BCM43602'' Press release] :[http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s915966 ''Broadcom Tri-Band'' Press release] *This is a tri-radio device - it's using three BCM43602s (like other [[Broadcom]] :''XStream'' gear, such as the [[Netgear R8000]] and [[ASUS RT-AC3200]]).
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32553-linksys-ea9200-ac3200-tri-band-smart-wi-fi-router-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :*CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4709A0 :*RAM: 256 MB, Flash: 128 MB :*2.4 GHz Radio: [[Broadcom]] BCM43602 ::- 2.4 GHz Power Amps (x3) :*5 GHz radio: 2x [[Broadcom]] BCM43602 ::- 5 GHz Power Amps (x3) :*PCIe: ''PLX Technology'' PEX8603 - 3-lane, 3-port PCIe switch :*Switch: in [[Broadcom]] BCM4709A0 - GbE (1x WAN, 4x LAN)
==See Also== *[[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] *[[ASUS RT-AC3200]] *[[Netgear R8000]] *[[TP-LINK Archer C3200]] *[[TRENDnet TEW-828DRU V1.0R|TRENDnet TEW-828DRU]]
